title: Little Light
description: A dark, volatile new play that asks if we can ever let go.Reminiscing.Once a year to tell stories.To share little bits of our little lives.A house by the sea. Teddy wants more light. He’s knocked that staircase down. Alison is soaked through. She’s livid. Clarissa’s ready to burst. They can’t keep meeting like this.
author: Alice  Birch
